typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as string,
		client_cd as string,
		client as string,
		type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> TMPCLIENT
TMPCLIENT filter(id=='-4'||id=='-3'||id=='-2'||id=='95'||id=='-1'||id=='96') ~> FILTERID
FILTERID sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['DM_CLIENT'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DMCLIENT
